title: Help with refunds!
body:
Hey riot! I haven't use any refunds on my account (not that I know of, anyway), and I wanted to refund a champion I recently bought using RP. But it says everything is 'Not Refundable' and I have no idea where all my 3 refund credits have gone! 

Please help me!

replies.body:
Took a quick look at your account. Seems like all three refunds were used a few months ago. 
When it comes to billing/store issues we don't tend to go into detail on the boards. But if you create a [Player Support request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) and share the request number with me, I'd be happy to talk with you privately.

> [{quoted}](name=2o2,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kEMBnWnb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-24T00:26:53.603+0000)
>
> Took a quick look at your account. Seems like all three refunds were used a few months ago. 
> When it comes to billing/store issues we don't tend to go into detail on the boards. But if you create a [Player Support request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) and share the request number with me, I'd be happy to talk with you privately.

I haven't used refunds yet on this account so that's surprising to me! I'll make a support ticket and we'll go from there
